intro: Rustia splendens, commonly known as the splendour rustia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, succulent leaves and clusters of small, bright yellow flowers. It thrives in well-drained sandy soils and is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments. Rustia splendens is often cultivated for its ornamental value and drought tolerance.
